title: 23 Things Every Veteran MUST Have In Common
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 Rounds in the magazine ... WARNING: There are SOME TOP GUN SPOILERS! Recap of Top Gun that does not include how high Kate was ... Round 1: After a long weekend, we need to do some barracks inspections to make sure there isnt a duck in your room doing quack. Round 2: Are we washed veterans? The military times released a list that has 23 things every veteran has for life. Do we fit in still? Weâ€™ll find out I guess. Im worried about Kate though. Round 3: Adapt, improvise, and overcome. One Airman did that with his uniform and we salute him. Round 4: 75000 afghan refugees need help. We are gonna talk about what we can all do to be that help. - Get your bottle at https://barstool.link/WhistlePigBSS or at a local retailer. - Go to https://barstool.link/RockyBootsBSS and enter the code ZBT at check out for 25% off your next pair of boots. - Go to https://barstool.link/TaylormadeBSS and use promo code BARSTOOL to create your own Spider GT. - Shop the Father's Day collection at https://store.barstoolsports.com/collections/barstool-sports-fathers-day
